verbose_text: Following stimulation for 5 min with Raji-PD-L1 + SEE, Jurkat-PD-1 OST SHP-1 - and Jurkat-PD-1 OST SHP-2 - cells showed PD-1-dependent dephosphorylation events similar to those of Jurkat-PD-1 OST cells (XREF_FIG A-7D), a finding consistent with their expression of functional PD-1 molecules (XREF_FIG C, left and middle panels).
